dcterms:creator: S. Barker
A. Mishra
D. Irwin
E. Cecchet
P. Shenoy
J. Albrecht
dcterms:description: UMass Smart Dataset includes minute-level electricity usage data from more than 400 anonymous homes, sliced to have the time span from January 1, 2016 to March 10, 2016, with a granularity set to 20 minutes, 1 hour, and 2 hours.
dcterms:title: UMass Smart Dataset

dcterms:creator: P. Street
dcterms:description: Pecan Street Texas Dataset includes minute-level electricity usage data from 310 units in Texas, sliced to have a time interval from January 1, 2016 to March 10, 2016, with a granularity set to 20 minutes, 1 hour, and 2 hours.
dcterms:title: Pecan Street Texas Dataset

dcterms:description: Synthetic dataset consisting of sinusoidal waves with Gaussian noise, designed to explore the influence of data cycle and training length on model performance.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Dataset
